page.title: 20THE WOMANS INSTITUTE
page.content: The{Womans Institute}is the most active organisation in{Ashton Under {Hill,}meetings being held on the first Tuesday evening of every month. Speakers provide a varied programme including talks on Travel, Music, Wild Life and History. Often demonstrations are given, particularly involving craft subjects and classes in various crafts are sometimes arranged. Members provide refreshments for many events in the village and are well known for their excellent cooking. On occasions they entertain Coach parties, Ramblers and Disabled people, as well as entering craft, food and preserves for competitions at local and county level. This project has been undertaken by members and friends of the Womans Institute at Ashton Under Hill.
